LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.label: hydroponic basin
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.description: A hydroponic basin can grow several plants quickly. The basin requires power to work and plants will die if the power is cut.150 fertility
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Blueprint.label: hydroponic basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Frame.label: hydroponic basin (building)
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Frame.description: A hydroponic basin can grow several plants quickly. The basin requires power to work and plants will die if the power is cut.150 fertility
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin.label: 先进水培盆
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin.description: 先进水培盆s grow plants quicker and provide their own light source. The basin requires power to work and plants will die if the power is lost.
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin_Blueprint.label: 先进水培盆 (蓝图)
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin_Frame.label: 先进水培盆 (建造中)
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin_Frame.description: 先进水培盆s grow plants quicker and provide their own light source. The basin requires power to work and plants will die if the power is lost.
LanguageData.ClutterAlloyHydroponicsBasinVS.label: 水培盆
LanguageData.ClutterAlloyHydroponicsBasinVS.descripti: A 水培盆 planted into the ground. Requires power.
LanguageData.ClutterAlloyHydroponicsBasinVS_Frame.des: A 水培盆 planted into the ground. Requires power.
LanguageData.Agrarian.label: 水培箱
LanguageData.Agrarian.description: A small self-watering wooden wood box with earth in it for growing plants. Requires power.
LanguageData.Agrarian_Blueprint.label: 水培箱 (蓝图)
LanguageData.Agrarian_Frame.label: 水培箱 (建造中)
